content.question: Assume a 10 percent increase in price increased the market quantity supplied by 20 percent. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: The value of the price elasticity of supply is 2.
The value of the price elasticity of supply is 0.5.
This price-quantity combination violates the law of supply.

content.answer: The value of the price elasticity of supply is 2.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
